This t-shirt design is in admiration of the Yellow Jersey winner of the 2012 Tour de France. Step forward Bradley Wiggins.
Only people who have been to cycling club events &ndash
column2: there is always a raffle and the prizes are generally rubbish &ndash
column3: would understand Wiggin's speech from the TdF podium on the last day of the 2012 race &ldquo
column4: Nah, I'm not doing it in French.&nbsp
column5: I'm going to announce the winners of the raffle&rdquo

column1: What's not to love about Bradley Wiggins? Not only has he become the first ever British winner of the Tour de France, he is witty and laid back in victory. No tears, no strutting, just good old fashioned cycle club humour.
This Bradley Wiggins t-shirt is one of a series we have created for Cycling Weekly in celebration of his greatness.
